channel.title: Fine on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Fine on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Fine
item.description: When she smiles They, smile. It makes me wonder why I feel this way. And all the connections, and emotions. To deal with them. In your way. And my way. There are very bad things in this world. Very good things, too. Which ones do you choose? We continue to choose both. Imbalance would be treason. If “they” know everything about you, What is there to fear? To be ashamed? To be guilty of?
